title: 刚打开存档就崩掉了，求解决方案
author: 若曦橙雪
txt_content:
如题，crashreport如下：
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Uh... Did I do that?
Time: 20-4-5 上午9:29
Description: Exception ticking world
java.lang.NullPointerException: Exception ticking world
